languages.text: "Ты зря столь усердно прячешься — я выше того, чтобы наказывать юродивых".
"You need not hide yourself so carefully. I am not one to punish a born fool."
languages.original_text: "Ты зря столь усердно прячешься — я выше того, чтобы наказывать юродивых".

traits.locale_text: "You need not hide yourself so thoroughly. I am not the one to punish a mooncalf."
"You need not hide yourself so thoroughly. I am not the one to punish a mooncalf."
"You need not hide yourself so diligently. I am not one to punish a mooncalf."
"You need not hide yourself so diligently. I am not one to punish a mooncalf."
"You need not hide yourself so carefully. I am not one to punish a born fool."
"You need not hide yourself so carefully. I am not one to punish a born fool."

languages.text: “你没必要这么小心翼翼地藏起来，我可不会对小丑发脾气。”
languages.original_text: "You need not hide yourself so carefully. I am not one to punish a born fool."

traits.locale_text: “你没必要这么小心翼翼地藏起来，我可不会对小丑发脾气。”

languages.text: «No es preciso que se esconda con tanta cautela. No soy proclive a castigar a los bufones que muestran un talento innato».
languages.original_text: "You need not hide yourself so carefully. I am not one to punish a born fool."

traits.locale_text: «No es preciso que se esconda con tanta cautela. No soy proclive a castigar a los bufones que muestran un talento innato».

languages.text: "Kendini bu kadar dikkatli gizlemene gerek yok. Doğuştan soytarı olan birini cezalandıracak değilim."
languages.original_text: "You need not hide yourself so carefully. I am not one to punish a born fool."

traits.locale_text: "Kendini bu kadar dikkatli gizlemene gerek yok. Doğuştan soytarı olan birini cezalandıracak değilim."

languages.text: 「そんなに注意深く隠れる必要はない。{mf|俺|私}は生まれながらの道化を罰したりしない」
languages.original_text: "You need not hide yourself so carefully. I am not one to punish a born fool."

traits.locale_text: 「そんなに注意深く隠れる必要はない。{mf|俺|私}は生まれながらの道化を罰したりしない」

languages.text: « Inutile de vous cacher ainsi. Je ne suis pas du genre à punir un pauvre bouffon attardé. »
languages.original_text: "You need not hide yourself so carefully. I am not one to punish a born fool."

traits.locale_text: « Inutile de vous cacher ainsi. Je ne suis pas du genre à punir un pauvre bouffon attardé. »

languages.text: "Ihr müsst Euch nicht gar so sorgfältig verstecken. Ich bestrafe keine geborenen Narren."
languages.original_text: "You need not hide yourself so carefully. I am not one to punish a born fool."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst Euch nicht gar so sorgfältig verstecken. Ich bestrafe keine geborenen Narren."
